## runU variable

Like [run](./pointfree.run.md)<!-- -->, but returns unwrapped result. Syntax sugar for: `unwrap(run(...),n)`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
runU: (prog: StackProc, ctx?: StackContext | undefined, n?: number) => any
```
